Text:
it just goes to show you how this person is either a) highly uneducated and can not read, or b) just a flat out fucking retard because i can garontee that the site in the description is SCENETIME and not scenebalance...

on a seperate note, i have been an avid user at scenetime and i can tell you first hand, for a private tracker, that there will always be seeders there.
